scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules _sass --source-map true --output-style compressed --output css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'css/**/*.css'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
scripts.test: yarn run lint-nginx && yarn run lint-scss
